purpose.description: Scuti is not just a marketplace. It is a global infrastructure merging Artificial Intelligence with the collaborative economy. We unite those who want to learn with those who love to teach, removing intermediaries and geographic barriers.

sections.heading: 1. Introduction
sections.body: At Scuti, privacy is part of our architecture, not an option. This policy explains how we handle your personal data within our learning and marketplace ecosystem.

sections.heading: 2. Data We Collect
sections.body: We collect information you provide directly (name, email, skills) and technical data necessary for platform operation (geolocation to connect with nearby mentors).

sections.heading: 3. Blockchain Usage
sections.body: Some transactions and certifications may be recorded on a public blockchain to ensure transparency. Please note that these records are immutable.

sections.heading: 4. Your Rights
sections.body: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data from our centralized servers at any time.

sections.heading: 1. Acceptance
sections.body: By accessing Scuti, you agree to be part of a community based on mutual respect and real value exchange.

sections.heading: 2. Scuti's Role
sections.body: Scuti acts as a technological intermediary. We are not employers of the tutors nor directly responsible for the content taught in private sessions.

sections.heading: 3. Economy & Payments
sections.body: Payments made through the platform are secured. The use of tokens for Swap is subject to community rules.

sections.heading: 4. Conduct
sections.body: Any abusive, discriminatory, or fraudulent behavior will result in immediate expulsion from the ecosystem.

cookies.text: We use cookies to enhance your experience in the Scuti universe. By continuing, you agree to our policy.
